pageContext.claim: “I'd hear these things, sir, uh, this is before I got elected. Guys would come up to me every once in a while, 'Sir, do you have anything to do with Russia?' I said, 'No, why do you ask?' 'Oh, I was just curious.' Because it was like this thing floating around. And then they come up again, 'Sir, are you sure you don't have anything to do with Russia?' I said, 'I have nothing to do with Russia. What the hell are you talking about?' And you know, you hear it four or five times, then you get into office and they come up with this scheme and this, this plot.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump did pursue business in Russia. Trump signed a nonbinding agreement in the fall of 2015 to pursue a deal for Trump Tower Moscow. He was continually updated on the project even while he publically denied he didn't have any business ties to Russia. Court documents say the deal was still in progress until just before the Republican National Convention.
